class Solution:
    def minimumOperations(self, nums: List[int], target: List[int]) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        diff = [target[i] - nums[i] for i in range(n)]
        ans = 0
        tmp = []
        for x, y in pairwise([0] + diff):
            tmp.append(y - x)
        inc = 0
        dec = 0
        #print(tmp)
        for x in tmp:
            if x > 0:
                need = max(x - inc, 0)
                inc -= x - need
                dec += need
                ans += need
            else:
                need = max(abs(x) - dec, 0)
                dec -= abs(x) - need
                inc += need
                ans += need
            #print(x, inc, dec, ans)
        return ans
